name: puhluettelo_backend
description: Simple Express server practice with CRUD functions

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../osa2/puhelinluettelo && npm run build --prod && cp -r build cp -r build ../../osa3/fullstack_mooc_part3_backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
